card.title: Overview
card.content:
With this tool you can ...
- display a distance plot. - display a distance histogram. - display a distance table. - interact between plot, histogram and table.

guide.title: Hide the residue pair no. column

steps.step: Under the *Table* menu, select **Hide Column** and then click on **Residue Pair No.**

guide.title: Show all columns of the distance table

steps.step: Under the *Table* menu, select **Show Column** and then click on **All Columns**.

guide.title: Customize the distance interval of the distance histogram

steps.step: Select a different value in the combobox.

guide.title: Restore defaults for the distance histogram

details.item: Every column in the distance table can be hidden. This can be done through the menu or the context-menu.
